name: Bad Space 4
description:
Made in roughly 4 days because I couldn't sleep one night. 
My goal was to try complete a game within 5 days, and I achieved that. 

Art assets are from the Kenny pack, but everything else was me :)
(If I feel like it I might change all the art too)

CONTROLS:

A & D rotate the ship 
W boosts forward 
Space shoots 
R restarts & escape or alt f4 to exit

Twitter: @b3nTurner
